function RIR_EP04_06()
    -- .起-4【11月第2週】「国民的アイドルからのお誘い」
    SaveData.Title = "国民的アイドルからのお誘い"

    -- //BG：1-A（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ That day, the whole academy was abuzz with talk about Miss Hermes all day long.]])

    MSG([[ It had been a while since Miss Hermes had shown her face at the academy.]])

    MSG([[ Not only did people gather in Hermes-san’s classroom during break time, but even during lessons, students were sneaking out to go see her. This was happening school-wide.]])

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑・汗）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0690.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Wry smile, sweat "Can we really keep it a secret that Miss Hermes is coming here today?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1415.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Wry smile, sweat "Uran-san was asked to take care of that. She’ll skillfully divert the students' attention outside the school building."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0691.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Wry smile, sweat "As expected of Senior Uran, she’s reliable. She even set up an empty classroom as a temporary infirmary for students who fainted after seeing Senior Hermes yesterday."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1416.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Wry smile, sweat "I really can't thank her enough. Honestly, I underestimated just how influential Miss Hermes is."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑）、エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fc")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0386(RE.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "What do you call it when you can’t lift your head? It’s like a haunted house with no tricks. Now then, what do you think that means?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0387.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Serious "Yes, Lira-chan, that was quick!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0692.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Panicked "Eh!? ‘Can’t raise your head’ and ‘not scary haunted house’...? Uh, is that like young people turning away from reality?"]])

    -- //SE：不正解音（ﾌﾞﾌﾞｰ）
PLAY_SE("SEz001.wav")
WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0388.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Sad "Nooooooooo! That answer isn’t cute at all! We young people always have chances to attack! We have to face reality!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 400, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0389.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Winking "Then Erika-chan, please tell us the correct answer<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1417.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Panicked "Me!? Umm, umm... Ah! I have it!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1418.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Smiling "Both mean ‘to be deeply impressed’."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //正解音（ﾋﾟﾝﾎﾟﾝﾋﾟﾝﾎﾟｰﾝ）
    PLAY_SE("SEz007.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0390.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "Yessssss! Erika-chan, you can even handle such absurd questions, you’re made for TV! Want to appear on a quiz show with me? Wanna come?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1419.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Wry smile, sweat "P-please spare me. I get a ton of prank quizzes like this at home."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0391.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "I see~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Then if you ever get motivated again, just contact me anytime<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0693.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Smiling "If Erika went on a quiz show, her natural cluelessness might be hilarious, haha."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0694.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Panicked "Wait... why did you suddenly start a riddle!? Just come in like a normal person!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0392.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "Surpraaaiiise<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0695.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Sad "If you say that, it’s 'surprise.' We’ve had enough of that kind of mistake from Senior Uran, and it’s hard to correct you when you confuse it with an uncommon musical term, so please stop."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 400, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0393.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Winking "Lira-chan picks up on subtle jokes, so I can’t help but add some flavor! Here, Erika-chan, here’s a tasty horse mackerel fillet for you!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1420.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Panicked "Horse mackerel as in the fish!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0696.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Sad "Alright, alright, I won’t add any more corrections. Let’s get to the main topic."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0697.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Serious "So, why has Senior Daria been absent from the academy all this time?"]])

    MSG([[ Lira firmly cut through the air and immediately went straight to the point.]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0698.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Serious "Is it related to Senior Hermes starting to come to school at this timing?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0699.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Serious "Because Senior Daria is like a completely different person... honestly, I can’t believe it’s unrelated."]])

    MSG([[ As expected of Lira-san. She boldly went into areas I wouldn’t easily approach.]])

    MSG([[ Watching how Hermes-san would answer, she opened her mouth with her usual carefree smile.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0394.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "It is related<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Because Daria-chan was adjusting her work so I could make memories at Yuriai Private Academy until I graduate!"]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1421.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Surprised "Daria-san adjusting her work?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0395.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Normal "Yes! Daria-chan also takes care of some of my manager duties, and she arranged my schedule so I could attend school from today until graduation!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0396.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "Whether it was being able to attend the entrance ceremony, or appear at the summer Princess Election or the school festival, it’s all thanks to Daria-chan<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0397.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "Even when I was crying wanting to attend Yuriai Private Academy, even when I was unsure about entering the last Princess Emperor election, she always pushed me forward... She’s my proud big sister!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1422.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Surprised "I see... so that’s how it was."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ After all, it’s a massive schedule adjustment for a national idol.]])

    MSG([[ Even if it took a month to organize, it wouldn’t be strange. It might even be considered quick.]])

    MSG([[ It makes sense. I think I would have accepted it in the past.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1423.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Serious "(Behind Hermes-san’s actions... there was always Daria-san’s presence.)"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ If only it weren’t for Akira’s report about seeing Daria-san apologizing to Marika-neesan.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0700.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Surprised "You took time off to make memories? Are you sure? Won’t you get blacklisted at work or something?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0398.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "It’s totally fine. I don’t have any flagship shows yet, so if I ask the producer pretty please, it’ll be totally okay<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0701.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Wry smile, sweat "Haha... as expected of a top idol."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0702.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Serious "By the way, I get that Senior Daria is acting for Senior Hermes, but what was with how she treated Erika this morning?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0703.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Serious "Talking with a senior who just came back to school after a while isn’t a big deal, right?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0399.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Surprised "Yeah, true. That surprised me too. I think Daria-chan is just doing her best."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0400.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Normal "Daria-chan was told by her mother to make sure I don’t have any contact with the ‘Princess.’ I don’t really know why."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0401.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "Actually, the reason I set time with you two today is related to that. I have a favor to ask of you!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1424.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Surprised "A favor?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0704.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Surprised "For us?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0402.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Serious "Yes! From now until graduation, I want you to go on dates with me on holidays!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1425.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Panicked "D-dates? With Miss Hermes?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Taken by surprise by such a request, we tilted our heads.]])

    MSG([[ But Hermes-san looked completely serious. She didn’t seem to be joking with us.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1426.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Surprised "I don’t mind that at all. But why go out of your way to make such a request?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0403.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Sad "As you both saw this morning, Daria-chan follows me wherever I go, so I can’t even hang out with friends..."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0404.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "But since it’s a special occasion, I want to hang out with all the ‘Princesses’! Because I love all of you so much!"]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san’s eyes welled up with tears as she looked at us.]])

    MSG([[ When looked at with such pure eyes, it’s hard to refuse and makes you want to help her.]])

    MSG([[ Besides, during dates with Hermes-san, we might be able to find some clues about the Daria-san suspicion.]])

    MSG([[ But I—]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1427.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Sad "Sorry, I can’t be of help."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0405.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Panicked "Ehh!?!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0705.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Panicked "Erika!? That’s so unlike you, what’s wrong!?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1428.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Sad "We have plans this weekend, and we’ve already turned down important prior engagements."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1429.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Smiling "So we can only go on dates from the weekend after that. If you don’t mind someone like me, I’d love to join you."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0406.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "Eh, Erika-chaaan! Thank youuuu!!!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0706.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Wry smile, sweat "Oh, that makes sense now. You had me worried."]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san and Hermes-san smiled in relief.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1430.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Wry smile "(This is for the best... Marika-neesan.)"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Ideally, to find a clue to save Marika-neesan, it might be best to date Hermes-san as soon as possible.]])

    MSG([[ But I think prioritizing that goal over betraying Riko-san, who truly cares about me, would be wrong.]])

    MSG([[ Even if Marika-neesan were right next to me, she would say the same thing.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1431.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Serious "Hermes-san, leave this to me. From now on, I’ll help you create memories as many times as you want."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0707.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Normal "Like Erika said, I can’t help this weekend with some errands, but I’ll do my part. Just tell me what you need."]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0708.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】 "I’ll also talk to Senior Uran. I’ll write down our SNS IDs on paper, so let’s have another strategy meeting."]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0407_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "Li-Lira-chan... Erika-chan... thank you sooooo much!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //CG：エルメスハグ（リラ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV012ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0709.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】 "Waah, huh!?"]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san cried out in surprise when Hermes-san hugged her.]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0407-0408(抜け)")
    MSG([[【Hermes】Smiling "Thank you! I really love you! Let’s chat a lot on LINE too～～～～<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    -- //BG：1-A教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ After saying that, Hermes-san rushed out of the classroom with a flurry.]])

    MSG([[ Left behind, Lira-san and I exchanged wry smiles.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1432.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Wry smile, sweat "As always, she’s like a whirlwind of a person."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0710.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Wry smile, sweat "Yeah. Well, I’m a bit relieved to know that Senior Daria was acting for Senior Hermes."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0711.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Serious "But I feel like there’s more to the situation. She’s seriously unreadable."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0712.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Surprised "…That’s right. Erika… th-thanks for earlier."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1433.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Surprised "Huh? What do you mean?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0713.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Blushing "W-well, you didn’t forget about the promise with Riko, right? Even though it’s a date with an idol, you treated it the same way... That made me happy like it was about me."]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0714.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Blushing "Even though it’s a date with an idol, you treated it equally… I was happy as if it was for myself."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1434.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Wry smile, sweat "Pl-please don’t worry about that. Minato would have said the exact same thing."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1435.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Smiling "For us, Lira-san, Riko-san, and Hermes-san are all equally important people."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07hb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0715.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Blushing "…Dummy. There’s no way they’re really the same."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1436.wav")
    MSG([[【Erika】Surprised "Lira-san?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0716.wav")
    MSG([[【Lira】Blushing "N-nothing... Sorry, I’m heading home now. Let’s talk about dates with Senior Hermes again with Senior Uran included!"]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Lira-san said that quickly and ran out of the classroom without waiting for my reply.]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_07")
end
